inputs.name: workloadIdentityServiceConnection
inputs.label: 'Entra Workload ID-backed Azure DevOps user' Service Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is an Entra Workload ID-backed Azure DevOps user Service Connection. If this is set, feedUrl and feedName are required. All other inputs are ignored.

inputs.name: feedUrl
inputs.label: Azure Artifacts Feeds url.
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the packaging url of the feed your service principal should connect to. If this is set, workloadIdentityServiceConnection and feedName are required. All other inputs are ignored. Not compatible with mavenServiceConnections.

inputs.name: artifactsFeeds
inputs.label: Feeds
inputs.helpMarkdown: Select one or multiple feeds to authenticate.

inputs.name: mavenServiceConnections
inputs.label: Credentials for repositories outside this organization/collection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Credentials to use for external repositories located in the project's pom.xml.
